title: Force on charge in center of cube of charges

content.question: Charges of equal magnitude are placed at the corners of a cube, with charges of <math alttext="negative q" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>q</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> at the top and charges of <math alttext="positive q" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>q</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> at the bottom, as shown in the figure above. If a positive charge is placed at the center of the cube, what is the direction of the force on it due to the other charges?
